name: Nishad Fatma
title: Designer & Founder
short_bio: Nishad Fatma is a renowned designer known for her unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary aesthetics.
achievements: With over a decade of experience in the fashion industry, Nishad has received numerous accolades for her innovative designs and commitment to sustainable practices.

story.intro: Nishad Fatma's journey in fashion began with a deep appreciation for India's rich textile heritage and traditional craftsmanship.
story.approach: Her approach blends ancestral techniques with modern design sensibilities, creating pieces that are both timeless and contemporary.
story.vision: Nishad envisions a world where traditional craftsmanship is preserved and celebrated through contemporary fashion.

philosophy.main: At the heart of Nishad's design philosophy is the belief that fashion should be both beautiful and meaningful.
philosophy.practices: Sustainable practices and ethical production are non-negotiable aspects of her brand.
philosophy.process: Each design goes through a meticulous process of ideation, sampling, and crafting to ensure exceptional quality.

recognition.industry: Nishad's work has been featured in leading fashion publications and exhibitions around the world.
recognition.influence: Her designs have influenced a new wave of designers focused on cultural preservation through fashion.
recognition.legacy: Through Ok Neppo, Nishad is creating a legacy of responsible luxury that honors artisanal skills.

studio.description: Located in a serene corner of Delhi, Nishad's studio is a creative haven where traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary design.
